jfilesyslib

Class DefaultDriverHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • jfilesyslib.DefaultDriverHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DriverHandler

    public class DefaultDriverHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DriverHandler
    The default driver handler.
    Under Windows & Mac OS X: Installs the driver
    Under other Unix OSes: Displays an error message
    Author:
    Marc Miltenberger
